text: Harold "Harry" Landers (born Harold Sorokin; September 3, 1921 - September 10, 2017) was an American actor. He was born in New York City, New York. He was known for his roles in Up Periscope (1959), The Gallant Hours (1960), and the Elvis Presley western Charro! (1969). Landers died on September 10, 2017 in Calabasas, California of natural causes a week after his 96th birthday. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Harry Landers at the American Film Institute * Interview with Harry Landers Classic TV History Blog, April 30, 2010 Category:1921 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from New York City
title: Harry Landers
